Title: Hungary’s MVM CEEnergy continues spot imports of Russian gas as EU phase-out deadline looms
Description: MVM CEEnergy, Hungary’s state-owned gas importer, is continuing to purchase spot pipeline gas from Russia via the Southern Route due to its price advantage over alternative sources, despite the European Union’s goal of phasing out Russian gas and LNG imports by 2027.
Author: JS

Title: Singapore’s LNG bunker sales rise to a four-month high in April
Description: Singapore’s LNG bunker sales rose for the second consecutive month to reach a four-month high in April, according to the Maritime Port Authority of Singapore.
Author: CK

Title: Germany’s Wilhelmshaven 2 LNG terminal is set to receive its commissioning cargo soon
Description: Germany’s Wilhelmshaven 2 LNG terminal is poised to receive its first LNG cargo soon, supporting ongoing commissioning operations and preparations for LNG send-out following the recent arrival of the terminal’s floating storage regasification unit, Excelsior.
Author: CK

Title: Unplanned outage at Alexandroupolis LNG extended further; limited restart from mid-August
Description: Greece’s Alexandroupolis LNG terminal, offline since Jan. 23 due to a technical issue, will remain shut until Aug. 15, a three-month delay from the previously expected May 15 restart, and the latest in a series of extensions to the prolonged unplanned outage. Terminal services will resume at just 25% capacity until Sep. 30.
Author: CK
